name: Seizure
0:
”Alexa ask seizure help to give me a fact about seizures”
”epilepsy”
”shaking”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seizure help
des: This skill provides general guidelines to follow during medical seizures It also provides facts about seizures and epilepsy. Please contact your local emergency medical service professional during an active seizure. Note: Tips in this skill are provided for your assistance and should NOT be considered medical advice. Please contact your medical professional for further assistance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
